column4: Has anyone here played yahoo games on their ubuntu OS yet? I can't get mine to work
have tried tutorials for installing java and I think it's installed but still not working
depends on the game. Ive gotten many to work with wine.
if its a downloadeable/exexutable - it may work with wine. Other then that.. good luck. :) ive seen a lot that DONT work with wine also. since they are some how flash-based in a weird way
